settings.title: Shipping information
settings.content:
Domestic USA orders will ship for free within 24 hours using standard shipping.

International orders will ship within 24 hours and shipping cost will be calculated at checkout based on the country of destination.

settings.subtitle: Bringing Nature to your Life
settings.title: Aromely
settings.text: A way to be more in tune with the natural world. A way to live more in the present moment. We want you to be able to feel better, live better, and love better every day. That's why we created Aromely Essential Oils with three simple ingredients: pure plant oils, pure plant essences, and a bunch LOVE!

settings.title: Style and Design
settings.text: You deserve to feel amazing, and we want you to experience that in your home or office. That's why Aromely diffusers are designed to be aesthetically pleasing, modern, and functional. We're always looking for ways to improve and we're committed to bringing you beauty and technology, together.

settings.title: Shopping Experience
settings.text: We stand by our products 100%. If you're not happy with it, we're not happy. We're committed to providing high-quality customer service and support for all our customers. We truly want our customers to leave us with a smile. Give us a try today!

settings.testimonial: This is one of the best things I have purchased! I am fan of having a room smelling nice and a candle does not even compare to this device. It fills up the room completely and concentrates much stronger and faster. There is also a variety of fragrances to choose from. I am overall very happy and satisfied with it and the service! 100% recommend.
settings.author: Dayana Bordatto
